name: rotten wooden shield
description: A shield made of rotting wood, barely holding together. It offers minimal protection.

name: basic wooden shield
description: A simple wooden shield, light and easy to carry. It provides basic protection against physical attacks.

name: stone shield
description: A sturdy shield made of stone, offering solid protection against physical attacks. It is quite heavy, making it less suitable for agile fighters.

name: copper shield
description: A shield crafted from copper, providing a balance of physical and magical defense. It is relatively light and easy to handle.

name: small steel shield
description: A small but sturdy shield made of steel. It offers excellent physical protection, though it is heavier than wooden shields.
